Text.Page:
The devas nicked our supplies time and time again. It's time for a little payback.

Snatch back some of the supplies and if you have to kill a few devas to get to them, so much the better.

Great! This is so wonderful.

(Droyan nods with approval.)

Those scoundrels also need to know what it's like. You have no idea how difficult it was for the people of Crescentia.
Look, it's not stealing. It's liberating. They stole food from our families. I'm just asking you to take it back.
